=== Planning ===
Going back to basics with planning questions:

* Why are we doing this? 
* Who are our readers? Do we have different reader communities to serve?
* What is our role in this election?
* What knowledge can we presume?

* What do our readers want to know?
* When do they need to know?
* What outcome scenarios are possible (and how likely are they)?
